org.javadev.layout

Class AnimatingCardLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.CardLayout
      • org.javadev.layout.AnimatingCardLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.LayoutManager, java.awt.LayoutManager2, java.io.Serializable, AnimationListener

    public class AnimatingCardLayout
extends java.awt.CardLayout
implements AnimationListener
    Custom Card Layout extended from java swing CardLayout to implement some animation effect.
    See Also:
